io.hekate.metrics.local

Interface MetricsListener

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface MetricsListener
    Metric listener.

    Instances of this interface can be registered within the LocalMetricsService in order to get notifications about metric updates. Listeners can be registered either statically or dynamically. Statically registered listeners survive Hekate node restarts, while dynamically registered listeners will be automatically unregistered when node gets terminated.

    Listeners gets notified every LocalMetricsServiceFactory.getRefreshInterval() right after the LocalMetricsService finishes gathering latest values from counters and probes.

    Note: listeners are notified on the same thread that performs metrics management and hence should process notifications as fast as possible. If notification processing is a time consuming task then it is highly recommended to offload such task to some other thread and process it asynchronously.

    See Also:
    LocalMetricsService.addListener(MetricsListener), LocalMetricsServiceFactory.withListener(MetricsListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUpdate(MetricsUpdateEvent event)
      Notifies this listener on metrics update event.

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdate

        void onUpdate(MetricsUpdateEvent event)
        Notifies this listener on metrics update event.

        Note: listeners are notified on the same thread that performs metrics management and hence should process notifications as fast as possible. If notification processing is a time consuming task then it is highly recommended to offload such task to some other thread and process it asynchronously.

        Parameters:
        event - Update event.
